"

Model output described in the 2007 IPCC Fourth Assessment Report (SRES scenarios), multi-year means

The table below lists all of the models, scenarios and variables available for which climatologies are available. Each entry on the table links to a page which displays the data available for that model/scenario/variable.

You can also browse the file contents and download selections of data as spreadsheet files (comma-separated-variable [CSV] format) through the DDC file navigator.
